core_products: AI-powered technology and analytics solutions for energy transition projects, including Smart Grid Suite, Energy Mobility, Analytics & AI, IoT Products, and Climate Tech.

products.product_description: Comprehensive Cloud-Edge Platform solutions and services designed to enable the end-to-end digital transformation of energy distribution grids.
Implementation of EV infrastructure, enabling a seamless transition to electric mobility.
Cutting-edge analytics and artificial intelligence solutions empowering energy companies with data-driven insights to enhance efficiency, reliability, and sustainability.
Diverse lineup of devices, from smart meters to sophisticated sensors and controllers, designed for modernizing electricity, water, and gas utility grids.
Addressing climate change challenges by decarbonization, utilizing emerging technologies like blockchain and artificial intelligence.

recent_moves.move_description: On April 16, 2025, Esyasoft acquired Good Energy, marking a bold step towards energy transition.
On November 25, 2024, Esyasoft Holding joined the United Nations Global Compact Initiative.
On September 2, 2024, Esyasoft was recognized as a Sample Vendor in the Gartner Market Guide for Meter Data Management Systems 2024.
On August 12, 2024, Esyasoft acquired a 70% stake in Dutch IoT innovator Float, expanding into the smart water technology solutions market.
On June 6, 2024, Esyasoft and Presight formed 'IntelliGrid' JV to revolutionize the energy distribution sector.
On December 27, 2023, Adani announced a Smart Metering Joint Venture with Esyasoft.

partnerships.partnership_name: Strategic Partnership with Landis+Gyr India Ltd.
partnerships.partnership_description: On December 7, 2023, Esyasoft and Landis+Gyr India Ltd. forged a strategic partnership to accelerate energy transition.

ownership: Easy Lease Vehicles Rental LLC is a subsidiary of Easy Lease Motor Cycle Rental P.J.S.C., which is publicly listed on the Abu Dhabi Securities Exchange under the ticker symbol EASYLEASE. The parent company is owned by IHC Capital Holding LLC (45.07%), Saeed Bin Mohammed Bin Ahmed Al Qassimi (22.50%), and Ahmad Mohammad Alsayed Al Sadah (22.50%).
